comments.content: I get up at 5:30 every morning. exercise, shower, eat breakfast, read emails... start working. I still feel like I'm screwing myself...

first.content: 😂maybe try to do something you've always wanted to do but hasn't been done yet?
first.name: 剋荔司Ding

comments.content: What do you want? Do you want to lose weight? Do you want to triple your income? Do you want to start a nonprofit? Do you want to find love? What is it? Get it, right here. You know what it is, don’t analyze it to death, just pick something. That’s part of the problem.

it is a video casted by TED ?
the style looks familiar and i strongly recommended TED as a English learning resource. It is fun, comprehensive, and full of knowledge.

we are not the talented guys so what we can do is jusy to work hard to get everything we want.
getting up earlier ....seems to be a hard work.
